Quick one: any recent findings on the optimal timing of taking supplements like berberine in relation to meals to maximize their effectiveness? 🤔

chats.speaker: Carla
chats.text:
The best timing for berberine is usually right before or with meals to help manage blood sugar spikes. 🍽️ Make sure to also take into account your medication schedule.
ACTION: {"type":"schedule_diet_update","date_iso":"2027-06-30","reason":"overdue_update"}

chats.text:
I'm happy to discuss berberine! 😃 Taking it before meals is generally recommended. This timing helps with blood sugar control, so it can be more effective.

chats.speaker: Rohan
chats.text:
Hey team,

Quick question on the diet front! I've read some conflicting info on the ideal protein intake for someone like me, with hypertension. 🤔 Any thoughts on what's optimal for me, considering my exercise plan?

chats.speaker: Carla
chats.text:
Protein is key for muscle repair and can help manage blood pressure, Rohan! 💪 For someone with hypertension and your exercise routine, aim for 1.2-1.7 grams of protein per kilogram of body weight per day. 
ACTION: {"type":"diet_update","date_iso":"2027-07-28","reason":"protein_intake"}
